SEARCH
程序包 com.se.aiconomy.server.service

接口 AccountService

所有已知实现类:
AccountServiceImpl
public interface AccountService
AccountService interface provides methods for managing user accounts, calculating financial statistics, and handling account-related operations.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    addAccount(Account account)
    Adds a new account.
    double
    calculateCreditCardDue(String userId)
    Calculates the total credit card due amount for a user.
    double
    calculateMonthlyIncome(String userId, Month month)
    Calculates the total income for a user in a specific month.
    double
    calculateMonthlySpending(String userId, Month month)
    Calculates the total spending for a user in a specific month.
    double
    calculateNetWorth(String userId)
    Calculates the net worth for a user by summing account balances and transaction amounts.
    LocalDateTime
    calculateNextDueDate(String userId)
    Calculates the next payment due date for all credit accounts of a user.
    List<Account>
    getAccountsByUserId(String userId)
    Retrieves all accounts associated with a specific user ID.
    void
    removeAccount(String accountId)
    Removes an account by its ID.
    void
    updateAccount(Account account)
    Updates an existing account.

  • 方法详细资料

    • addAccount

      void addAccount(Account account)
      Adds a new account.
      参数:
      account - the account to add

    • updateAccount

      void updateAccount(Account account)
      Updates an existing account.
      参数:
      account - the account to update

    • removeAccount

      void removeAccount(String accountId)
      Removes an account by its ID.
      参数:
      accountId - the ID of the account to remove

    • getAccountsByUserId

      List<Account> getAccountsByUserId(String userId)
      Retrieves all accounts associated with a specific user ID.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      a list of accounts belonging to the user

    • calculateNetWorth

      double calculateNetWorth(String userId) throws ServiceException
      Calculates the net worth for a user by summing account balances and transaction amounts.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      the calculated net worth
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs during calculation

    • calculateMonthlySpending

      double calculateMonthlySpending(String userId, Month month) throws ServiceException
      Calculates the total spending for a user in a specific month.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      month - the month to calculate spending for
      返回:
      the total spending amount
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs during calculation

    • calculateMonthlyIncome

      double calculateMonthlyIncome(String userId, Month month) throws ServiceException
      Calculates the total income for a user in a specific month.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      month - the month to calculate income for
      返回:
      the total income amount
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs during calculation

    • calculateCreditCardDue

      double calculateCreditCardDue(String userId)
      Calculates the total credit card due amount for a user.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      the total credit card due amount

    • calculateNextDueDate

      LocalDateTime calculateNextDueDate(String userId)
      Calculates the next payment due date for all credit accounts of a user.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      the next due date, or LocalDateTime.MAX if none found
